attributes.action: Tax 'producers' for the use of excess packaging on goods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should housholds be charged for disposing of the excess packaging used on goods,when we have no control over this. The producers of these goods must be made to carry the cost.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
